mapper.select: SELECT SF.id, SF.name , SF.has_caret AS hasCaret, SF.icon, SF.label, SF.parent_id AS parentId, SF.is_dir AS isDir, SF.content, SF.is_expanded AS isExpanded FROM script_file SF JOIN script_user_rw SUR ON SF.id = SUR.script_file_id WHERE SUR.mlsql_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mlsql_backend_proxy WHERE backend_name=#{backendName} AND mlsql_group_id=#{groupId}
